snippet: Construction of multifamily buildings has far outstripped that of single-family homes as housing costs and meager wage growth have increased the rate of renting rather than owning homes.
lead_paragraph: Construction of multifamily buildings has far outstripped that of single-family homes as housing costs and meager wage growth have increased the rate of renting rather than owning homes.

headline.main: Sluggish Economy Drives Surge in Apartment Construction
headline.print_headline: Sluggish Economy Drives Surge in Apartment Construction
